hero.title: Welcome to Bailovo Village
hero.subtitle: Birthplace of the great Bulgarian writer Elin Pelin
hero.description: Discover the beauty and history of one of the most picturesque villages in Sofia Province

about.title: About Bailovo Village
about.description: Bailovo is a small but historic village in Sofia Province, best known as the birthplace of the renowned Bulgarian writer Elin Pelin (Dimitar Ivanov Stoyanov). The village is located in a picturesque area, surrounded by green hills and rich history.

museum.title: Elin Pelin Museum
museum.description: Visit the birthplace of the great writer, converted into a museum

culture.title: Cultural Center
culture.description: The center for cultural activities and community events

nature.title: Nature
nature.description: Enjoy the beautiful nature and hiking trails

news_events.title: News and Events
news_events.description: Stay up to date with the latest events in our vibrant community in Bailovo village

cta.title: Visit Bailovo Village
cta.description: Experience the history, culture, and beauty of Elin Pelin's birthplace

history.title: History of Bailovo Village
history.content: Bailovo village has a rich history that spans centuries. The village is best known as the birthplace of Dimitar Ivanov Stoyanov, better known by his pseudonym Elin Pelin, born on July 8, 1877.

museum.title: Elin Pelin Museum
museum.description: The birthplace of Elin Pelin in Bailovo village has been converted into a museum that showcases the life and work of the writer.

culture.title: Cultural Center
culture.description: The cultural center is the heart of community activities in Bailovo village.
